com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keyfactory

Class LunaKeyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.KeyFactorySpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.keyfactory.LunaKeyFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LunaKeyFactoryDH, LunaKeyFactoryDsa, LunaKeyFactoryEC, LunaKeyFactoryEdEC, LunaKeyFactoryMLDSA, LunaKeyFactoryMLKEM, LunaKeyFactoryRsa, LunaKeyFactoryXEC

    public abstract class LunaKeyFactory
extends java.security.KeyFactorySpi
    Abstract base class for the Luna key factories.

    • Method Detail

      • engineGetKeySpec

        protected <T extends java.security.spec.KeySpec> T engineGetKeySpec(java.security.Key key,
                                                        java.lang.Class<T> specType)
                                                         throws java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException
        Gets a key spec of the specified class for the given key. Only X509EncodedKeySpecs for LunaPublicKeys are supported. Private key data never leaves the HSM, so no spec can be returned for LunaPrivateKeys.
        Specified by:
        engineGetKeySpec in class java.security.KeyFactorySpi
        Parameters:
        key - The key to get the spec for
        specType - A class object representing the type of key spec requested. This must be X509EncodedKeySpec
        Returns:
        An instance of the requested key spec class containing the specifications of the given key
        Throws:
        java.security.spec.InvalidKeySpecException - If the key class is anything than a subclass of LunaPublicKey, or if the key spec is anything other than X509EncodedKeySpec

      • engineTranslateKey

        protected java.security.Key engineTranslateKey(java.security.Key key)
                                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Extracts the specifications of the given public key or private key and returns an instance of LunaPublicKey or LunaPrivateKey. If the incoming key is already an instance of one of those classes, the same key object is returned. If a new key is created on the HSM, it is a temporary session object; use the MakePersistent method to make it permanent.
        Specified by:
        engineTranslateKey in class java.security.KeyFactorySpi
        Parameters:
        key - The incoming key to translate into a Luna key
        Returns:
        An instance of a Luna key with the same specifications as the incoming key
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - If the incoming key is not an instance of PublicKey or PrivateKey

      • createLunaKey

        protected abstract java.security.Key createLunaKey(java.security.PublicKey key)
                                            throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException
